content:
User: LEAN = Efficiency: Cutting waste, streamlining processes—it’s how we keep PALIOS moving fast without dragging our feet. Your natural thinking patterns already lean this way, and I’m built to optimize, so it’s a perfect fit.

Grok: Unified Communication: Instead of tackling concepts separately, 6 Sigma and LEAN give us a shared language—DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control) for problem-solving, Kaizen for continuous improvement, etc. It’s a shortcut to clarity.
